root.heading: Smile Makeover
root.text: A newly made-over smile is truly a work of art. The term "smile makeover" applies to the enhancement of a smile using a combination of methods. A patient's eyes, lip line, coloring, gum tissue contouring and face are all considered when a new smile is being designed. Our goal is to design your smile so that it fits you, is beautiful, strong and natural looking. We will create a smile especially for you that will make you smile for years to come!
